main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, cigar-shaped object in the sky estimated to be about 1 foot x 3 feet in length during an observation that lasted for 7 seconds.
interesting points: The object changed colors from bright yellow to orange and then to reddish., The sighting occurred in the Pennsylvania area., The witness described the object as making no noise and it appeared to be hovering before disappearing., The witness's estimated size of the object was about the size of a small car., It was reported that the object moved very slowly and silently.
witness description: A male, age 12 at the time of observation.
